content: मंदारः [मंद्-आरक्] {@--1@} The coral tree, one of the five trees in Indra's paradise; हस्तप्राप्यस्तबकनमितो बालमंदारवृक्षः <ls>Me. 75</ls>, <ls n="Me.">67</ls>; <ls>V. 4. 35.</ls> {@--2@} The plant called Arka. {@--3@} The Dhattūra plant. {@--4@} Heaven. {@--5@} An elephant. --रं A flower of the coral tree; <ls>Ku. 5. 80</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 23.</ls>
